verbs.description: [ARG1: First lady Melania Trump 's approval rating] [V: is] [ARG2: up] [ARGM-EXT: more than 10 percentage points] [ARGM-TMP: since the beginning of the year] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a CNN poll] .
First lady Melania Trump 's approval rating is up more than 10 percentage points since the beginning of the year , [V: according] to a CNN poll .
